title: Mathematics Learning Design Using Rule-Based Instructional Design Support Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic mathematical concepts and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Utilization of customized learning design tools to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies

learning_goals: Learners can generate context-specific math learning activity sequences with 80% accuracy using ontology-based instructional design tools
Perform the learning design compatibility verification procedure at least three times using feedback provided by the rule-based system
Apply the combination of learning resource metadata and OWL/SWRL rules to the design of mathematical problem-solving projects

resources: Digital learning resource repository access permissions

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
